name: Richard D. RUGGIERI v. Phillip M. LOWE et al.

judges: MURRAY and SHEA, JJ., did not participate.
parties: Richard D. RUGGIERI v. Phillip M. LOWE et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
MURRAY and SHEA, JJ., did not participate.

attorneys: Joseph J. McGair, Warwick, for plaintiff-respondent.
Carroll, Kelly & Murphy, S. Paul Ryan, Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Richard D. RUGGIERI v. Phillip M. LOWE et al.
No. 82-249-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
June 25, 1982.
Joseph J. McGair, Warwick, for plaintiff-respondent.
Carroll, Kelly & Murphy, S. Paul Ryan, Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
